content: Victoria was later deemed via calculations as the ideal mate for Yandroth.  Doctor Strange was able to rescue her from the Scientist Supreme.When England was transformed into a fascist state by Sir James Jaspers, Victoria nursed fellow captive Psylocke back to health.In preparation for his battle with Shuma-Gorath, Doctor Strange used black magic to steal Victoria's magic potential. Strange returned the power to her after Shuma-Gorath's defeat.Victoria also befriended the Black Knight (Dane Whitman). Garrett Castle was located nearby land owned by the Bentley family. She became the castle's caretaker while Whitman was in the Crusades.
powers: Victoria possessed great magic potential, although she seemed unaware of how to use it.
